name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Christopher RIVERS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Christopher RIVERS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Order of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John J. McCreesh, III, Upper Darby (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Eric Beller, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 941
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Christopher RIVERS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 19, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
John J. McCreesh, III, Upper Darby (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Eric Beller, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
